messages.message:
[09:43:38] LOG.error: SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1111 Invalid use of group function (SQL: select bravo_tours.id, bravo_tours.title, bravo_tour_category.name as category, users.first_name as create_user, users.phone,
    bravo_tours.sale_price, bravo_tours.duration as rooms, bravo_tours.address, bravo_locations.name as location, 
    bravo_tours.created_at, bravo_locations.map_lat, 
    bravo_locations.map_lng, bravo_tours.bedPlaces, bravo_tours.floor, bravo_tours.content, media_files.file_path as imageid_path, bravo_terms.name as comfort_name, bravo_tours.is_featured
    from bravo_tours inner join bravo_tour_category on bravo_tours.category_id = bravo_tour_category.id 
    inner join bravo_locations on bravo_tours.location_id = bravo_locations.id
    inner join media_files on media_files.id = bravo_tours.image_id
    inner join bravo_tour_term on group_concat(bravo_tour_term.tour_id,bravo_tours.id)
    inner join bravo_terms on bravo_terms.id = bravo_tour_term.term_id
    inner join users on users.id = bravo_tours.create_user) {"exception":{"errorInfo":["HY000",1111,"Invalid use of group function"]}}
messages.label: error

exceptions.message:
SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1111 Invalid use of group function (SQL: select bravo_tours.id, bravo_tours.title, bravo_tour_category.name as category, users.first_name as create_user, users.phone,
    bravo_tours.sale_price, bravo_tours.duration as rooms, bravo_tours.address, bravo_locations.name as location, 
    bravo_tours.created_at, bravo_locations.map_lat, 
    bravo_locations.map_lng, bravo_tours.bedPlaces, bravo_tours.floor, bravo_tours.content, media_files.file_path as imageid_path, bravo_terms.name as comfort_name, bravo_tours.is_featured
    from bravo_tours inner join bravo_tour_category on bravo_tours.category_id = bravo_tour_category.id 
    inner join bravo_locations on bravo_tours.location_id = bravo_locations.id
    inner join media_files on media_files.id = bravo_tours.image_id
    inner join bravo_tour_term on group_concat(bravo_tour_term.tour_id,bravo_tours.id)
    inner join bravo_terms on bravo_terms.id = bravo_tour_term.term_id
    inner join users on users.id = bravo_tours.create_user)
